name: grav (itch) (Benjamin Red)
description:
Control three spheres with the click of your mouse. This fast-paced puzzle arcade game takes quick thinking and careful coordination. If you crush the right blocks, you might survive long enough to rack up a high score.

Keep an eye out for power blocks. you'll get a temporary advantage depending on which sphere hits it...

  • Light Sphere = Free-for-all
  • Red Sphere = Powerball
  • Dark Sphere = Crunch Time

Enjoy! Grav is the first game in a triptych along with bbox and hero. If you have questions or feedback, hit me up me on Twitter, or leave a comment below.
